title: keseoma
author: keseoma
content: Now we have saw the fail of Luna and USTseems Waves and USDN works same with Luna, same stable coin based on algo, and same defi ...Anyone know the proctol of Waves and give us some advice s?

comments.author: Jasad
comments.body: Quote from: keseoma on May 13, 2022, 02:22:03 AMNow we have saw the fail of Luna and USTseems Waves and USDN works same with Luna, same stable coin based on algo, and same defi ...Anyone know the proctol of Waves and give us some advice s?Waves have drop early before Luna coin because last month Waves make new all time high reach above $60 before going dump right now under $7. I think all connected with Luna will faced bad trouble later and better be careful for every one keep holding Luna coin assets, not working yet if try hold and save coin like Luna but I don't agree Waves will be the next Luna coin. Keep potential with every time Waves ever drop lower price and have chance back to the top price again.

comments.author: electronicash
comments.body: Waves was also attacked. any smart contract platform with algo stablecoin are attacked. but this i think was more focused on Terra.

comments.author: hichamito37
comments.body: Quote from: keseoma on May 13, 2022, 02:22:03 AMNow we have saw the fail of Luna and USTseems Waves and USDN works same with Luna, same stable coin based on algo, and same defi ...Anyone know the proctol of Waves and give us some advice s?Luna created a shock in the market, a lot of investors thought of death when Luna collapsed so I wouldn't expect any coin to crash like Luna. Yesterday USDT also lost peg but then everything is back to normal looks like someone is looking for a total market crash. The market is going through terrible days, I hope it ends soon.

comments.author: death69
comments.body: Waves have been on the market for a long time so there are loyal investors who are willing to buy and hold waves. Luna, on the other hand, is a new coin with a lot of promise but right now no one wants to buy it. I do not think there will be another instant death from the top 100 cryptocurrency

comments.author: aprilnot
comments.body: Quote from: death69 on May 13, 2022, 03:44:47 AMWaves have been on the market for a long time so there are loyal investors who are willing to buy and hold waves. Luna, on the other hand, is a new coin with a lot of promise but right now no one wants to buy it. I do not think there will be another instant death from the top 100 cryptocurrencyyes you are right, after all the case of luna and UST are different. their main problem is the absence of a real 1:1 backed. from the start maybe UST didn't have backed, and that's why when there was a big selloff they couldn't return the peg. in the end it's a real ponzi project, made for just a moment's profit.
